verses.roman:
haridāsa-ṭhākura tāṅre bahu-kṛpā kailā
'tumi āsibe,--more prabhu ye kahilā'

synonyms: hari-dāsa-ṭhākura—of the name Haridāsa Ṭhākura; tāṅre—unto him; bahu-kṛpā kailā—showed much affection because of love and mercy; tumi āsibe—you will come; more—me; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; ye—that; kahilā—informed.
translation: Out of affectionate love and mercy, Haridāsa Ṭhākura told Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī, "Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu has already informed me that you would come here."
